comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
0. I have installed eclipse 3.2.1 and matching versions of GEF, EMF and GMF as well as EMF dependencies (OCL etc).
1. Open the  project explorer view in eclipse.
2. Right click to see the context menu
3. The menu does not open. The exception given below is seen.
Same problem is also seen if we create a new navigator type view. 
4. Create a new CommonNavigator based view, say. "TestNavigator" using navigator extension points as suggested in docs. The plugin.xml contents are given below in the "More Information" field.
5. Launch TestNavigator in runtime workbench with all plugins in the launch configuration.
6. Open TestNavigator view. Same exception as below is seen.
7. Launch runtime workbench using only required plugins (do not include org.eclipse.jdt.ui). The TestNavigator works fine.


java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError 
at org.eclipse.ui.navigator.NavigatorActionService.fillActionBars(NavigatorActionService.java:231) 
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.navigator.CommonNavigatorManager.selectionChanged(CommonNavigatorManager.java:144)

at org.eclipse.ui.internal.navigator.actions.CommonActionDescriptorManager.<clinit>(CommonActionDescriptorManager.java:46) 


More information:
If I open the view in runtime workbench, it works fine provided we launch only plugins that are required. I found that if org.eclipse.jdt.ui plugin and its dependencies are added to the launch configuration, then the problem given above occurs. 

Plugin.xml contents for the CommonNavigator based view:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?eclipse version="3.2"?>
<plugin>
   <extension-point id="WindowMenuItems" name="WindowMenuItems" schema="schema/WindowMenuItems.exsd"/>
   <extension-point id="NavigatorViewMenuItems" name="NavigatorViewMenuItems" schema="schema/NavigatorViewMenuItems.exsd"/>
   <extension-point id="FunctionProviders" name="FunctionProviders" schema="schema/FunctionProviders.exsd"/>
   <extension-point id="InstalledRepository" name="System Installed Repository" schema="schema/InstalledRepository.exsd"/>
   <extension
         id="catidenature"
         name="ACES Nature"
         point="org.eclipse.core.resources.natures">
      <runtime>
         <run class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.SystemNature"/>
      </runtime>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.actionSets">
      <actionSet
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.systemrunmenuactionset"
            label="System Menu Set"
            visible="true">
         <menu
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu"
               label="%acesmenuLabel"
               path="additions">
            <separator name="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.sep1"/>
            <separator name="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.sep2"/>
            <separator name="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.sep3"/>
            <separator name="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.sep4"/>
         </menu>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.ProjectSettingsEditorAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.ProjEditor"
               label="Edit Project Settings"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep1"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to edit project details"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.ProjectRefreshMenuAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.ProjectRefreshMenu"
               label="Refresh Project"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep1"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to refresh the project"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.datadelete.DataDeleteEditorAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.DataDelete"
               label="Clean Data File"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep1"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to clean data ydd files"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.DataUnitsDefinitionDialogAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.DataUnits"
               label="Manage Data Units"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep1"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Manage Data Units"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.ValidateModelAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.ValidateSystemAction"
               label="Validate System"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep2"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to validate the system"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.ValidateModelAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.ValidateDiagramAction"
               label="Validate Diagram"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep2"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to validate the diagram in focus"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.GenerateCodeAction"
               enablesFor="100000000"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.StopBuild"
               label="Stop Build"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep3"
               style="push"
               toolbarPath="Normal/additions"
               tooltip="Click here to terminate the system build"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.GenerateCodeAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.StartBuild"
               label="Build"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep3"
               style="push"
               toolbarPath="Normal/additions"
               tooltip="Click here to Validate, Generate, and Compile code for the System"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.GenerateCodeAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.Compile"
               label="Compile"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep3"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to Compile code for the System"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.GenerateCodeAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.GenerateCode"
               label="Generate Code"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep3"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to Generate code for the System"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.repositorylists.OpenRepositoryListsFormEditorAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.RepListsAction"
               label="%replistsactionLabel"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep4"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to open the List Manager"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.RepositoryManagementAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.RepositoryManagerAction"
               label="Repository Manager"
               menubarPath="com.esdevenv.sdt.System.SystemRunMenu/sep4"
               style="push"
               tooltip="Click here to open the Repository Manager"/>
      </actionSet>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.popupMenus">
      <viewerContribution
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectrepodetails"
            targetID="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectnavigator#PopupMenu">
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.ProjectRefreshAction"
               helpContextId="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.ProjectRefresh"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.ProjectRefresh"
               label="Refresh Project"
               menubarPath="additions"
               tooltip="Refresh Project"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projecteditor.ProjectSettingsFormEditorAction"
               helpContextId="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.EditProjectSettings.help"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.EditProjectSettings"
               label="Edit Project Settings"
               menubarPath="additions"
               tooltip="Edit Project Settings"/>
         <action
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.actions.AddRepositoryAction"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.AddRepository"
               label="Add Repository"
               menubarPath="additions"
               tooltip="Add Repository"/>
      </viewerContribution>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.views">
      <category
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.views.category"
            name="ACES System Design Tool"/>
      <view
            allowMultiple="false"
            category="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.views.category"
            class="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.CommonNavigator"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectnavigator"
            name="System Navigator"/>
   </extension>
   <extension
         id="SystemDevelopmentPreferencePageID"
         name="System Development"
         point="org.eclipse.ui.preferencePages">
      <page
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.preferences.SystemDevelopmentPreferencepage"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.SystemDevelopmentPreferencePage"
            name="System Development"/>
      <page
            category="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.SystemDevelopmentPreferencePage"
            class="com.simplifiedlogic.lmp.preferences.LicensePrefPage"
            id="LicensePrefs"
            name="License Management"/>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.core.runtime.preferences">
      <initializer class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.preferences.PreferenceInitializer"/>
   </extension>

   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.navigatorContent">
      <navigatorContent
            activeByDefault="true"
            contentProvider="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.ProjectExplorerContentProvider"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectNavigatorContent"
            labelProvider="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.ProjectExplorerLabelProvider"
            name="Project Navigator Content"
            priority="normal">
         <triggerPoints>
            <or>
               <and>
                  <instanceof value="org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject"/>
               </and>
               <instanceof value="java.lang.String"/>
            </or>
         </triggerPoints>
         <possibleChildren>
            <or>
               <instanceof value="java.lang.String"/>
            </or>
         </possibleChildren>
         <commonWizard
               type="new"
               wizardId="com.cat.ide.plc.ui.projects.SDTAdvancedProjectWizard">
            <enablement>
               <or>
                  <adapt type="org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource"/>
               </or>
            </enablement>
         </commonWizard>
         <commonWizard
               type="new"
               wizardId="com.cat.ide.plc.ui.projects.SDTSimpleProjectWizard">
            <enablement>
               <or>
                  <adapt type="org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource"/>
               </or>
            </enablement>
         </commonWizard>
         <commonWizard
               type="new"
               wizardId="com.cat.ide.plc.ui.CATIDEModelWizard">
            <enablement>
               <or>
                  <adapt type="org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource"/>
               </or>
            </enablement>
         </commonWizard>
         <commonSorter
               class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.ProjNavCommonSorter"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projNavCommonSorter">
            <parentExpression>
               <or>
                  <instanceof value="org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource"/>
               </or>
            </parentExpression>
         </commonSorter>
      </navigatorContent>
      <actionProvider
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.ModelOpenActionProvider"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.actions.ModelOpenActions"
            overrides="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resources.OpenActions">
         <enablement>
            <or>
               <instanceof value="org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile"/>
            </or>
         </enablement>
      </actionProvider>
      <actionProvider
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.ModelDeleteActionProvider"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.actions.ModelDeleteActions"
            overrides="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resources.actions.EditActions">
         <enablement>
            <or>
               <instanceof value="org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject"/>
            </or>
         </enablement>
      </actionProvider>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.viewer">
      <viewerContentBinding viewerId="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectnavigator">
         <includes>
            <contentExtension pattern="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectNavigatorContent"/>
            <contentExtension pattern="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.filters.*"/>
            <contentExtension pattern="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resourceContent"/>
            <contentExtension pattern="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resources.filters.*"/>
         </includes>
      </viewerContentBinding>
      <viewer viewerId="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectnavigator">
         <popupMenu
               allowsPlatformContributions="true"
               id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectnavigator#PopupMenu">
            <insertionPoint name="group.new"/>
            <insertionPoint
                  name="group.open"
                  separator="true"/>
            <insertionPoint name="group.openWith"/>
            <insertionPoint
                  name="group.edit"
                  separator="true"/>
            <insertionPoint name="group.reorganize"/>
            <insertionPoint
                  name="group.port"
                  separator="true"/>
            <insertionPoint
                  name="group.build"
                  separator="true"/>
            <insertionPoint
                  name="additions"
                  separator="true"/>
            <insertionPoint
                  name="group.properties"
                  separator="true"/>
         </popupMenu>
      </viewer>
      <viewerActionBinding viewerId="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projectnavigator">
         <includes>
            <actionExtension pattern="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resources.NewActions"/>
            <actionExtension pattern="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resources.ResourceMgmtActions"/>
            <actionExtension pattern="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resources.PropertiesActionProvider"/>
            <actionExtension pattern="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.actions.*"/>
            <actionExtension pattern="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resources.actions.EditActions"/>
            <actionExtension pattern="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.resources.PortingActions"/>
         </includes>
      </viewerActionBinding>
   </extension> 
   
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.navigator.navigatorContent">
      <commonFilter
            activeByDefault="true"
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.navigator.ProjectContentFilter"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.filters.ProjectContentFilter"
            name="ESDEVENV Project Filter"/>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.editors">
      <editor
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.repositorylists.RepositoryListsFormEditor"
            default="true"
            icon="icons/cat_electronics_logo_small_black_1.jpg"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.repositorylists.RepositoryListsFormEditor"
            name="Repository and List Editor"/>
      <editor
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.datadelete.DataDeleteEditor"
            default="true"
            icon="icons/cat_electronics_logo_small_black_1.jpg"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.DataDeleteEditor"
            name="Data Deletion Editor"/>
      <editor
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.projecteditor.ProjectSettingsFormEditor"
            default="true"
            icon="icons/cat_electronics_logo_small_black_1.jpg"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.ProjectSettingEditor"
            name="Project Settings Editor"/>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.newWizards">
      <category
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.systemcategory"
            name="System Development"/>
      <wizard
            category="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.systemcategory"
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.repositorywizard.RepositoryWizard"
            hasPages="true"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.RepositoryWizard"
            name="New Repository"/>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.exportWizards">
      <category
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.Export"
            name="System Development Project Export"/>
      <wizard
            category="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.Export"
            class="com.esdevenv.sdt.systemeditor.portwizards.ProjectExportWizard"
            icon="icons/Custom1_16.ico"
            id="com.esdevenv.sdt.SystemEditor.ExportWizard"
            name="Project Export Wizard"/>
   </extension>
   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.importWizards">
      <category

      <wizard

</plugin>
